## Free Swag

<img src="www/images/npeu_tshirt_buttons.png" alt="tshirt picture" width="350"/>


If you're a member of the Union, you can get a free t-shirt and button from NPEU! Visit the [NPEU website](https://nonprofitunion.myshopify.com/) and use a discount code (reach out to a member of the [BC](about.qmd#bargaining-committee) for the code) to get one t-shirt and two buttons at no cost. When you receive your swag, feel free to post a selfie on social media, tag [@NonprofitUnion](https://twitter.com/NonprofitUnion) and [@UrbanInst_Union](https://twitter.com/urbaninst_union) and use the hashtag #SolidarityForGood.
